title: [Silken Mist, Deck]
description: The elegant walkway of the deck is crafted from handset fel planks polished to such a deep rich lustre that the nearby soft torchlight dances upon the surface.  Gleaming brass oil lanterns have been snuffed for the day and seagulls wheel overhead, occasionally swooping down to snatch something from the sea below.

The elegant walkway of the deck is crafted from handset fel planks polished to such a deep rich lustre that the nearby soft torchlight dances upon the surface.  Gleaming brass oil lanterns provide a romantic ambiance to the outer deck and the mood is further enhanced by the soothing sounds of the sea below.
room.location: Silken Mist on Four Winds Isle
